programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Experience Jake Pinnick’s extraordinary odyssey from Wudang Mountain, an acclaimed UNESCO World Heritage site and birthplace of Taoist martial arts, to mastering ancient kung fu and Taoist music, forging a transcultural bridge between Eastern and Western civilizations through the universal wisdom of Taoist philosophy.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: To understand the personalities of the locals, you have to dive into their food and culture. Chef Li introduces Noelle to sea cucumber.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie is investigated for the letter she transcribed for Bai Mu Lin who denies having anything to do with it. She is then offered the opportunity to confess her father's crimes, but she stands by her principles and refuses.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: The more Shi Qiang learns about Ye Wen Jie, the more suspicous he gets. Wang Miao re-enters the Three-Body game where everything has changed pointing to changes in civilization, but the goal of predicting the patterns of solar changes is the same.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Mandy comes back in a mess after her holiday after being abandoned by Jun Yuan on a deserted island and having to row herself back on a sampan. She looks for Jun Yuan and questions him. Jun Yuan points out that only has herself to blame and exposes her for her schemes in order to get close to him and marry into a wealthy family.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Brandon contracts a venereal disease from Mr Peh and vents his anger on Gui De, unhappy that he did not warn him. Gui De decides to teach Mr Peh a lesson and beats up Mr Peh together with a group of bad friends, landing himself in the police station. Shocked at what Gui De did, Miao Miao asks You Nian for help. You Nian agrees to come home as soon as possible.

programme.title: The Reunions
programme.desc: On a whim, a comedy film director decides to make a film about how his grandmother would celebrate New Year's Eve in their rural hometown. Unexpectedly, the grandmother passes away before he started shooting so the whole family gathered together for a final party.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Experience Jake Pinnick’s extraordinary odyssey from Wudang Mountain, an acclaimed UNESCO World Heritage site and birthplace of Taoist martial arts, to mastering ancient kung fu and Taoist music, forging a transcultural bridge between Eastern and Western civilizations through the universal wisdom of Taoist philosophy.

programme.title: American Moments
programme.desc: Part 2. Yen Jeng is a scientist at NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL). This is the story about how he grew up in an orphanage and become who he is now.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Wang Xuan commands her secret guard, Pang Gui, to assist Song Huai En in the fight against the Huizhou army.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Faced with the siege of Prince Jianning's army, Wang Xuan shows her determination and encourages the defenders and people to resist together.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Outside of Huizhou, the battle is in full swing. Wang Xuan is fearless and helps to take care of the wounded.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Si Jin Er tries to poison Wang Xuan, but fails. Later, a masked assassin tries to assassinate Wang Xuan but is subdued by her guard and Song Huai En.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Wang Xuan returns to the capital and is reunited with her brother.

programme.title: Better Plan for Better Life
programme.desc: In the new era of intelligent manufacturing, scientific and technological achievement intertwine with family life through high-speed rail, smart homes, global online shopping, convenient smart phone mobile platforms, and cashless payments.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: At a college forum, guest speaker SNK News anchor Man Wai-sum colludes with an inquisitive student to embarrass Kwong Cheung Heavy Industries chairman Dr Lo.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Wai-sum interviews Kwong Cheung Heavy Industries chairman Dr Lo, who was embarrassed by her at the forum.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Hiu-mei is framed by Sze-ching. She ends up feeling depressed and having a breakdown in the powder room.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Yip Sun becomes the new president, and Wai-sum wins another battle.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Lau Yim is drenched in blood. She takes precious first-hand pictures.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: A sharpshooter and his ingenious partner, known as Bullet and Brain, must protect the personal finances of a criminal.
